channel.title: Creating my own logo (symbol)
channel.description:
In my Language Arts class we are currenty doing a fun'ish' activity in which we make a logo that goes along with our personality. I'm not sure though what I should draw. I am a basic artsistic person I usually sketch drawing like dragons or people with swords...
My personality in school:
Quiet Active Between D and B averages I day dream alot (or when im sleepy I'm just dreaming) I treat my teachers how they treat me I never do my homework unless its near report cards time or something like that. Always in class before the bell
Outside Personality/with friends: Loud Active Usually playing basketball|Foot ball
Home: Lazy Quiet'ish' Responsible with most easy chores Can get attitudes
Computer: I express alot more I talk alot more I am alot better at learning on the comuter than listening to boreing lectures I am less artistic with pc programs.
Other: I am 14, about 5'10 or 5'11 I always excercise in summer I love games I enjoy socializing with my buds I love to draw mythical creatures I always see friends on certain days I live in a lonely neightborhood with older ppls. I snowboard Work with dad
Thats mostly it. I expect more understanding people to support me in this because I really don't need help I just wanna see what I'd be best at drawing for because I'm not that great with ideas.
Directions: Draw a logo that represents you and or what you do, your personality. Afterwards describe it on the back.
This is really easy basic stuff but anyway suggest:
Color Symbol
Thanks guys, John :)

item.title: Creating my own logo (symbol)
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote="[-J O H N-"]link=topic=245083.msg2068445#msg2068445 date=1203570803]
In my Language Arts class we are currenty doing a fun’ish’ activity in which we make a logo that goes along with our personality. I’m not sure though what I should draw. I am a basic artsistic person I usually sketch drawing like dragons or people with swords…

My personality in school:

Quiet
Active
Between D and B averages
I day dream alot (or when im sleepy I’m just dreaming)
I treat my teachers how they treat me
I never do my homework unless its near report cards time or something like that.
Always in class before the bell

Outside Personality/with friends:
Loud
Active
Usually playing basketball|Foot ball

Home:
Lazy
Quiet’ish’
Responsible with most easy chores
Can get attitudes

Computer:
I express alot more
I talk alot more
I am alot better at learning on the comuter than listening to boreing lectures
I am less artistic with pc programs.

Other:
I am 14, about 5’10 or 5’11
I always excercise in summer
I love games
I enjoy socializing with my buds
I love to draw mythical creatures
I always see friends on certain days
I live in a lonely neightborhood with older ppls.
I snowboard
Work with dad

Thats mostly it. I expect more understanding people to support me in this because I really don’t need help I just wanna see what I’d be best at drawing for because I’m not that great with ideas.

Directions: Draw a logo that represents you and or what you do, your personality. Afterwards describe it on the back.

This is really easy basic stuff but anyway suggest:

Color
Symbol

Thanks guys,
John :)[/quote]
We did this at my school awhile back…do you go to harding?

Read full topic

item.title: Creating my own logo (symbol)
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

Hmm, snow boarder. Nice idea. I’ll think about it since I am actually good at drawing sports and ppl doing them.

item.title: Creating my own logo (symbol)
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

Draw a snowboard and put J-O-H-N in it put like a day dream thing next to it

also add great coder

make a bell ringing and u running into class

there u go, hope it helped.

Read full topic
